greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n^n - n.
comment: Number of endofunctions on [n] such that no element has a preimage of cardinality n. - _Alois P. Heinz_, Jul 21 2014
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: E.g.f.: 1/(1 + LambertW(-x)) - x*exp(x), where LambertW() is the Lambert W-function. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Feb 08 2017
results.author: Lawrence H. Shirley (LShirley(AT)towson.edu), May 30 2001
ext: a(0)=1 inserted by _Alois P. Heinz_, Jul 21 2014
